name: Burg_103
culture_notes: Riveric Dialect dominant; loanwords from Coastal Tongues
Regular river-offering rites tied to harvest/fishing
Diet heavy on smoked fish, freshwater algae cakes
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or mind-control magics
navigational auguries supplement but do not replace seamanship
notes: Small riverside waypoint controlling a ford and ferry
Seasonal siltation affects trade; reagent traders travel infrequently
